{{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PL1000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B01929ESG6 |newegg=9SIACCX5526282 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM60333 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV2, SISO |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Powerline 1000, 1 Port}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/powerline/PL1000.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=PL1000}}
Probably uses a Broadcom BCM60333 [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-features/32727-the-truth-behind-homeplug-speed based on the 1000Mbps claim].
